blog.name: comicsqualityreviews
blog.title: Comic-book Quality Reviews
blog.description: I have been reading comic books all my life but there is still too many comics to read. Join me in this fun journey of figuring out my personal favorites.

title: New Blood!
body:
Avengers #221. July, 1982.
By Jim Shooter, David Michelinie, Bob Hall and Brett Breeding.

The Avengers decide to replenish their depleted ranks, and the Wasp calls for suggestions for new members to be submitted by their next meeting. Thor seeks out Spider-Man and asks him to join, but the flattered web-spinner promises only to consider the idea. Iron Man and Captain America ask Hawkeye to return to the roster, and he enthusiastically accepts. The Wasp decides the group needs more female members and invites several costumed adventuresses to brunch. The gathering is crashed by Fabian Stankowicz, the Mechano-Marauder, who again attempts to gain notoriety by battling an Avenger, but the women defeat him easily, while all but one decline Jan’s invitation to join the team. Thus, a few days later, following an altercation in traffic on their way to the meeting, the two new recruits, Hawkeye and the She-Hulk, are officially inducted.

From Marvel Wikia

Let’s assume you are in a super-hero group and you need to add new members. Members your life will depend on in the line of battle. People you trust, people you can rely on. People that will not tarnish the name of your group to the ground.

Well, you would probably not make the choices these people make here.

In their defense, those are pretty good super-heroes (Dazzler though…)

But you probably wouldn’t organize a slumber party to get to know them… or maybe you would… whatever works for you.

I feel like the art looks very classic, but maybe too “old school” by 1982. The best reason it works in this version, is most likely the recoloring.

I give the issue a score of 7.50.

reblog.comment:

title: Black Widow: Sexual Espionage
body:
Natasha Romanoff is very flexible. And no one in the Marvel Cinematic Lesbian Universe is safe…

An Avenger and the Wasp

This story takes place before the events of the previous chapter ‘An Avenger’s Infinite Sex’.Lurking in the shadows backstage at a special United Nations conference Natasha Romanoff waited impatiently…

Read more…

blog.name: superheroesincolor
blog.title: Superheroes In Full Color
blog.description: This blog is dedicated to Racial and cultural diversity in comic books and derivative works (film, tv, videogames)

summary: Avengers  #1 (2018)  // Marvel Comics The man who would become the earliest known person to take up the Black Panther mantle...
caption:
Avengers  #1 (2018)  // Marvel Comics

The man who would become the earliest known person to take up the Black Panther mantle after discovering a Vibranium meteor and unlocking its secrets. He and the other Stone Age Avengers fought an out-of-control Celestial called the Fallen, eventually defeating it and sealing it in an underground chamber in what would become the modern-day country of South Africa.

Story: Jason Aaron, art: Ed McGuinness

Get it now here

[Follow SuperheroesInColor faceb / instag / twitter / tumblr / pinterest]

blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. tags: six years of tony trying his honest best but still murdering her hair every morning
summary: one unexpected spider side effect peter eventually finds out about is he’s really good at like, patterns. weaving, knitting,...
body: one unexpected spider side effect peter eventually finds out about is he’s really good at like, patterns. weaving, knitting, sewing, crocheting, anything like that he’s suddenly a natural at. one time when he was babysitting morgan stark they got bored so he tried out all the most complicated braid styles he could find on her and from that day on she flat out refuses to let anyone else even come near her hair

reblog.comment: one unexpected spider side effect peter eventually finds out about is he’s really good at like, patterns. weaving, knitting, sewing, crocheting, anything like that he’s suddenly a natural at. one time when he was babysitting morgan stark they got bored so he tried out all the most complicated braid styles he could find on her and from that day on she flat out refuses to let anyone else even come near her hair

summary: Bucky's face when that dude started reciting his activation words in civil war is somehow more tragic to me that all the deaths...
body:
Bucky’s face when that dude started reciting his activation words in civil war is somehow more tragic to me that all the deaths in infinity war

idk why but there was just so much going on in infinity war and so much tragedy it was too much to process maybe
